title: [1.14-1.16.X][roughlyenoughresources-RER资源管理器]
author: 痴癡
txt_content:
本帖最后由 痴癡 于 2020-8-16 23:17 编辑 

仅限单人模式
(若服务器不安则无法使用本模组)

MOD介绍作者的话

Roughly Enough ResourcesThis is meant to be a replacement for [size=1.2]Just Enough Resources, which itself is meant as a replacement for [size=1.2]Not Enough Resources.In short, it will show you what blocks spawn at what heights in the world. Note that there are some cases where blocks (which are what the world is made of) and items (which is what REI will show recipes for) don't completely mesh up. RER tries to account for this in several ways. Some of these will show up as multiple recipes attached to the same item -- for example, torches on walls and torches on the floor are different blocks, but the same item. Others will show as a vaugely related item -- water and lava show as their corresponding buckets, and fire blocks show up as flint & steel. A few different blocks show up as a question mark. but you can get the name of the block by hovering over it. REI, somewhat sadly, has strangely partial support for air -- if you try hitting the "R" button on an air item, nothing will happen. Recipes for air are only visible on the list of all "world generation" recipes.简而言之，此mod会显示方块生成概率，物品掉落概率，和生物掉落物品概率
mod更新日志2020/7/111.16更新2020/5/13 v2.0.0更新到20w20a2020/3/18 v1.3.2固定REI村民模式2020/3/2 v1.31修正错误2020/3/1 v1.3.0新实体渲染2020/3/1 v1.2.0 添加了实际的客户端和服务器拆分。服务器现在将数据发送到客户端。不同尺寸的单独类别。新的和改进的设计。更新至1.15.2更新以支持最新的REI2019/7/4 1.1.0这是1.0.0的固定版本。没有实际的新功能，这只是我第一次上传的版本。注意：客户端-服务器拆分尚未正确支持。仅限单人2019/6/29 1.0.0发布
